sentence.Network_en: The other two, thymine and cytosine, are single ring structures called pyrimidines.

sentence.Network_en: There are just four kinds: adenine, thymine, guanine and cytosine.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有4种: 腺嘌呤 、 胸腺嘧啶 、 鸟嘌呤和胞核嘧啶.

sentence.Network_en: Thymine or thymine nucleotide concentration was all disqulified.

means.word_mean: 1. a base found in DNA (but not in RNA) and derived from pyrimidine; pairs with adenine
